feed.title: Track Awesome Healthcare Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: Curated list of awesome open source healthcare software, libraries, tools and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on May 20 - May 26, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / Libraries

  • Hermes (⭐187) - a SNOMED CT terminology server.
  • Metriport (⭐607) - Open-source universal API for healthcare data.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on May 20 - May 26, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • Akello - Integrated Mental Health Infrastructure

Contents / Frameworks

  • Inferno - providing testing tools for the FHIR

Contents / Libraries

  • nhs-numbers (⭐11) - Python package to provide utilities for NHS Numbers, including validity checks, normalisation, and generation.

Contents / PHR

  • Fasten Health (⭐2.3k) - open-source, self-hosted, personal/family electronic medical record aggregator

Contents / Telemedicine

  • Healthcare worker at home - ​ Open Source Telehealth software

Contents / Research

  • LabKey Server - Platform for Translational Research.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2023
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • ERPNext (⭐26k) - Modules that help manage patients, appointments, consultations, lab tests, and billing.
  • HOSxP - Thai Hospital Information System that aims to ease the healthcare workflow of health centers and central hospitals.

Contents / Specifications

  • Continuity of Care Document - Continuity of Care Document specifications
  • DICOM Standards Browser - Provides an effective way to learn the DICOM standard and inspect DICOM attributes.
  • HL7 Version 2 - Specifications for all versions of HL7v2
  • OHDSI OMOP Common Data Model - Standardized data model for many healthcare concepts, awesome Github presence including scripts for many major relational databases.

Contents / Laboratory

  • OpenELIS - Laboratory Information System for Global Health.

Contents / Applications

  • Simple - For clinicians to track patients with high blood pressure.

Contents / Books

  • Inspired EHRs (⭐128) - Ideas, designs, and techniques for designing an Electronic Health Record (EHR).

Contents / Data

  • EDS_NLP (⭐125) - provides a set of spaCy components to extract information from clinical notes written in French
  • eds-scikit (⭐40) - a tool to assist data scientists working on the AP-HP's Clinical Data Warehouse. It is specifically targeted for OMOP-standardized data.

Contents / Design

  • Determinants of Health (⭐86) - Determinants of Health Visualization.
  • Health Icons (⭐719) - A collection of open source icons for public health projects.

Contents / Machine learning

  • MedicalGPT (⭐4k) - Training Your Own Medical GPT Model with ChatGPT Training Pipeline.
  • MONAI (⭐6.6k) - AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging.
  • PyHealth (⭐1.2k) - A Deep Learning Python Toolkit for Healthcare Application.

Contents / Logistics

  • OpenBoxes (⭐737) - an Open Source Inventory and Supply Chain Management System.
entry.summary: 17 awesome projects updated on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Jun 19 - Jun 25, 2023
entry.content:
Contents / Frameworks

  • CyclOps (⭐85) - Framework for healthcare ML implementation.

entry.content:
Contents / Frameworks

  • Medblocks UI (⭐64) - Web Components for rapid development of openEHR and FHIR systems.

Contents / Libraries

  • Datamol (⭐505) - Molecular Manipulation Made Easy. A light Python wrapper build on top of RDKit.

Contents / Data

  • Atlas BI Library (⭐17) The unified report library.

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • Medplum (⭐1.7k) - Developer platform that enables flexible and rapid development of healthcare apps.

Contents / Imaging

  • Omero (⭐211) - open source client/server system written in Java for visualizing, managing, and annotating microscope images and metadata
  • OpenSlide (⭐440) - is a C library for reading whole slide image files.
  • Viv (⭐313) - multiscale visualization of high-resolution multiplexed bioimaging data on the web.

Contents / Libraries

  • Rust FHIR (⭐16) - Rust SDK for HL7 FHIR

Contents / Data

  • Cedar (⭐8) - Open source tool for testing the strength of Electronic Clinical Quality Measure.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022

  • Zato - A Python-based ESB and integration platform for healthcare interoperability, automation and orchestration.

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Aug 01 - Aug 07, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / Imaging

  • Kaapana (⭐213) - Open source toolkit for state of the art platform provisioning in the field of medical data analysis.

Contents / Frameworks

  • LinuxForHealth FHIR Server (⭐347) - Modular Java implementation of version 4 of the HL7 FHIR specification.

Contents / Libraries

  • Asymmetrik FHIR API Server (⭐405) - A secure REST implementation for the HL7 FHIR Specification.

  • FHIRModels (⭐194) - FHIRModels is a Swift library for FHIR resource data models.

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Aug 09 - Aug 15, 2021
entry.content:
Contents / Imaging

  • DICOMcloud (⭐229) - A standalone DICOMweb server with RESTful implementation of the DICOMweb/WADO services.
  • DICOM Server (⭐484) - OSS Implementation of DICOMweb standard.
  • Fiji - Open-source platform for biological-image analysis.

Contents / Frameworks

  • FHIR Proxy (⭐73) - secure application that acts as an intermediary in the transfer of FHIR data to and from Azure API.
  • FHIR Works on AWS (⭐300) - FHIR Works on AWS deployment.

Contents / Integration

  • FHIR Converter (⭐461) - an open source project that enables conversion of health data from legacy formats to FHIR.

Contents / Data

  • OpenSAFELY - Secure analytics platform for Electronic Health Records in the NHS.
entry.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Aug 09 - Aug 15, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 12 - Apr 18, 2021
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • HospitalRun - Helps provide the most modern Hospital Information System possible to the least resourced environments.

Contents / Imaging

  • Cornerstone (⭐2.1k) - Open source project with a goal to deliver a complete web based medical imaging platform.
  • Drishti (⭐193) - Tomography and electron-microscopy data visualizer for both scientists and lay people.

Contents / Frameworks

  • CareKit (⭐2.5k) - Open source software framework for creating apps that help people better understand and manage their health.

Contents / Libraries

  • Evil-DICOM (⭐183) - C# DICOM Library.
  • Python SMART on FHIR client (⭐646) - Flexible Python client for FHIR servers supporting the SMART on FHIR protocol.

Contents / Applications

  • Intervention Engine (⭐32) - Provides a web-application for data-driven team huddles.

Contents / Datasets

  • Medical Data for Machine Learning (⭐5.9k) - Curated list of medical data for machine learning.
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Apr 12 - Apr 18, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • Bahmni - Electronic Medical Record and hospital system.
  • EHRBase OpenEHR Clinical Data Repository.
  • EHRServer (⭐193) - CaboLabs EHRServer.
  • OSCAR EMR - OSCAR McMaster Project.

Contents / Specifications

  • OpenEHR - Open specification upon which software can be built.

Contents / Imaging

  • OHIF (⭐3.7k) - OHIF zero-footprint DICOM viewer and oncology specific Lesion Tracker.

Contents / Dental

  • Open Dental - Dental Practice Management Software.

Contents / Frameworks

  • API Server (⭐108) - FHIR Server to support patient- and clinician-facing apps.
  • Clinical Meteor project - Meteor for FDA, HIPAA, and HL7 compliant applications.

Contents / Libraries

  • Archie (⭐54) - OpenEHR Library written in Java.
  • DCMTK - DICOM Toolkit.
  • dicom (⭐1k) - High Performance DICOM Medical Image Parser in GoLang.
  • Fellow Oak DICOM (⭐1.1k) - DICOM for .NET, .NET Core, Universal Windows, Android, iOS, Mono, and Unity.
  • FHIR protocol buffers (⭐884) - A Google implementation of protocol buffers for FHIR.
  • php-fhir (⭐134) - Tools for creating PHP classes from the HL7 FHIR Specification.
  • pynetdicom (⭐542) - A Python implementation of the DICOM networking protocol.

Contents / Machine learning

  • Healthcare.ai - Python and R tools for healthcare machine learning.

Contents / Logistics

  • OpenLMIS - Open source, web-based, electronic logistics management information system (LMIS) software, purpose-built to manage health commodity supply chains.
entry.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2021
entry.content:
Contents / Imaging

  • InVesalius - Open source software for reconstruction of computed tomography and magnetic ressonance images.

Contents / Libraries

  • FHIR .NET API (⭐883) - The official .NET API for HL7 FHIR.
  • HAPI FHIR (⭐2.2k) - Java API for HL7 FHIR Clients and Servers.

Contents / Asset Management

  • Tapirx (⭐31) - Networked medical device discovery and identification.

Contents / Logistics

  • ID3C (⭐22) - Data logistics system enabling real-time genomic epidemiology.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Oct 12 - Oct 18, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • GNU Health - Electronic Medical Record, Hospital Management, and Health Information System.
  • FreeMedForms EMR - Electronic Medical Record software.
  • LibreHealth EHR - Clinically-focused Electronic Health Record System.
  • OpenClinic (⭐37) - Medical Records System.
  • OpenEMR - Electronic Health Records and Medical Practice Management application.
  • OpenEyes - Electronic Medical Record application for ophthalmology.
  • OpenMRS - Enterprise Electronic Medical Record System platform.

Contents / Specifications

  • Open mHealth - Open Standard For Mobile Health Data.
  • SMART on FHIR - Open standards based technology platform.

Contents / Imaging

  • dcm4che - Clinical Image and Object Management.
  • Horos - Medical image viewer.
  • LibreHealth Radiology - Customized version of LibreHealth Toolkit with additional tools for radiology and imaging professionals.
  • OpenREM - Radiation Exposure Monitoring for physicists.
  • Orthanc - Lightweight DICOM server for healthcare and medical research.
  • VTK - 3 dimensional visualization toolkit supporting a variety of algorithms and modeling techniques.

Contents / Dental

  • OpenMolar - Dental Practice Management Software.

Contents / Frameworks

  • FHIRBase - Storage based on the FHIR Standard.
  • Opal - Framework for building clinical applications.
  • Spark (⭐271) - Public domain FHIR server developed in C#.

Contents / Libraries

  • MITK - The Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit.

Contents / Integration

  • NextGen Connect Integration Engine (⭐1.1k) - The swiss army knife of healthcare integration.

Contents / Bioinformatics

  • Bcbio (⭐1k) - Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling, RNA-seq and small RNA analysis.
  • Wregex - Amino acid motif searching software with optional Position-Specific Scoring Matrix.

Contents / Data

  • cTAKES - Natural Language Processing System for extraction of information from Electronic Medical Record clinical free-text.
  • Snow Owl (⭐273) - Highly scalable, open source terminology server with revision-control capabilities and collaborative authoring platform features.
entry.summary: 25 awesome projects updated on Oct 12 - Oct 18, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Sep 14 - Sep 20, 2020

Contents / EHR

  • Cottage Med - Electronic Medical Record software designed by physicians.

Contents / Nursing

  • open-eObs - Observation and clinical assessment platform that offers a real-time view of all patients across a ward.

Contents / Data

  • IHRIS - Health Information System for management of human resources for health.

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • MedinTux - French Medical Practice Management System.
  • Open Hospital - Electronic Medical Record software for underprivileged rural hospitals.

Contents / Imaging

  • 3D Slicer - Cross-platform application for analyzing, visualizing and understanding medical image data.
  • ITK - Toolkit used for the development of image segmentation and image registration programs with leading-edge algorithms in 2 and 3 dimensions.
  • ITK-SNAP - Interactive software for 3 dimensional image navigation, annotation, and automatic segmentation with an emphasis on user-friendliness.

Contents / Libraries

  • Health data standards (⭐0) - Ruby library for generating and consuming various healthcare related formats. These include HITSP C32, QRDA Category I, and QRDA Category III.

Contents / Hardware

  • OpenAPS - The Open Artificial Pancreas System project is an open and transparent effort to make safe and effective basic Artificial Pancreas System.

Contents / Data

  • Caisis - Oncology research software with a Patient Data Management System.
  • Synthea Patient Generator (⭐2.6k) - Synthetic patient generator that models the medical history of synthetic patients.
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 10 - Apr 16, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / Frameworks

  • Intervention Engine FHIR Server (⭐114) - Generic FHIR server implementation in GoLang.
  • Swift-SMART (⭐137) - Swift SMART on FHIR framework for iOS and OS X.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Apr 10 - Apr 16, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / EHR

  • Odoo Medical (⭐278) - Universal Health and Hospital Information System.
  • openMAXIMS (⭐64) - Full Patient Administration System designed for the NHS.

Contents / Specifications

  • FHIR - Fast Health Interoperability Resources.

Contents / Prescribing

  • OpenEP (⭐20) - Suite of medicines management apps that improve the safety and efficiency of prescribing and medicines management.

Contents / Frameworks

  • ResearchKit (⭐5.7k) - Software framework that makes it easy to create apps for medical research or for other research projects.

Contents / Libraries

  • fhir.js (⭐430) - JavaScript client for FHIR.
  • Node HL7 (⭐58) - Node module that is bridged with the Java Hapi HL7 library.
  • Python HL7 (⭐295) - Simple library for parsing messages of HL7 version 2.x into Python objects.
  • Ruby FHIR (⭐173) - FHIR client implementation in Ruby.
  • Ruby HL7 (⭐96) - Ruby HL7 library.

Contents / Applications

  • SMART Pediatric Growth Chart (⭐69) - Pediatric growth charts.

Contents / PHR

  • Tidepool - Data platform to reduce the burden of Type 1 Diabetes.

Contents / Research

  • i2b2 - Research data warehouse.

Contents / Integration

  • OpenHIM - Health information mediator.

Contents / Hardware

  • Gluco (⭐43) - Glucometer.
  • Murgen - Ultrasound imaging development kit.

Contents / Bioinformatics

  • ADAM (⭐1k) - Genomics analysis platform.
  • Galaxy - Open web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research.
entry.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2017
